Title: Worldsoul: Priory of the Sacred Flame
Description:
My people have always had a close bond to the Light. A faith I once thought was unshakeable. But there are some--

<Faerin pauses, momentarily lost for words.>

There are some who believe that faith should be... enforced. This has always been something the Arathi has struggled with, even back in the Empire. 

But things have gone to far. These... zealots have taken over the Priory of the Sacred Flame. They're hurting people!

This isn't what the Light is about, $n. Stop them.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Priory of the Sacred Flame dungeon at Heroic difficulty or higher.
